version_description:
Good day, commanders! We have an update on board!

What's new:
Global control modernization - set everything on your taste.
Auto-aiming, horizontal and vertical aiming for accurate target hit!
Main gun shots are readjusted - riple fire and scattering shells.
Improved visual effects and realism.
Added consumables and super-weapon on board.
Improved game performance and fixed bugs.

Good day, commanders!
What's new:
Fixed problems with consumable use in the battle
Improved game performance

Dear friends!
We are glad to introduce you new update!
• Join in the battles for strategic location - new map is waiting for you!
• Improve the performance of the game.
• Various bug fixes.
Improve the performance of the game and various bug fixes.
